name: 0 - Outro
_source: speak;Caroline; Don't celebrate yet.{w} We killed all the demons, but they'll come back if we're not careful.{w} We'd best burn the bodies quickly.
speak;Emma; No, mother{tgm}...{tgm} I want to have a proper burial for these townsfolk.{w} It's the best way to make sure their souls pass on in peace.
speak;Caroline; If you say so, Emma{tgm}...{tgm} I'll leave you in charge of that.
speak;Caroline; So, you're the Dawn Brigade I've heard so much about from Sarah?
speak;Carlos; Yes we are. I'm Carlos, their tactician.{w} Kate is the leader and Luna is her younger sister.{w} Kate may be our leader, but{tgm}...
speak;Carlos; I consider myself a free thinker and take my own action from time to time.
speak;Kate; Since you're such a free thinker, Carlos,{w} perhaps you can think about this little <bconvo>TALK</> I want to have with you!
speak;Carlos; Yes we are. I'm Carlos, their tactician who-
speak;Kate; Our tactician who cowered inside a house,{w} while leaving the rest of us to fight for our lives and sending my sister to battle?
speak;Carlos; Well, erm, there was no reason for me to jump in while you had it handled.
speak;Kate; Well then, Carlos, perhaps you can handle this little <bconvo>TALK</> I want to have with you!
speak;Kate; Caroline, Sarah, follow us.{w} You wanted a meeting, so here it is.
speak;Sarah; Ah, I need a moment.
speak;Kate; Fine by me.{w} Gives me more time to have a <red>gentle</> chat with Carlos.
